name: HyperCubes
description:
HyperCubes

You must try and destroy the red and blue cubes to gain their secrets, all the while avoiding the obstacles and the drones defending the cubes. And once you've uncovered all the secrets, you must fight the boss...

Controls:

  • Mouse - Look around
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • Right Click - Thrust

Tips:

  • Shooting and thrust uses energy. It recharges over time so make sure to manage it carefully. 
  • Shooting has recoil, so you can use it for manoeuvring.
  • Each time you hit the cubes, the defending drones will shoot you and the cube will begin to move faster.
  • When you see the drones shoot, make sure to dodge the shots. You only have 3 lives.
  • After 5 hits, the cubes will be destroyed, giving you a point and revealing their secret.
  • Each time you destroy the cubes, they will spawn with an extra drone and a new secret.
  • The red cube holds bad secrets, while the blue cube holds good ones.

Goals:

  • Try and get all 6 secrets (3 red, 3 blue) without dying.
  • Get as many points as possible before facing the Boss.
  • Defeat the Boss and win the game.
  • Find the real secret... ;)

Created by Paul Chirculescu, Ibrahim Qasim and Lidia Teleoaca for CSS GameJam 2018.
